feature.label: AjiML Editor
feature.provider-name: University of Applied Sciences and Arts Dortmund
feature.description: The AjiML Editor is a model editor to create graphical models of microservice systems. As part of the AjiL Tool Suite the resulting models can be used to create microservice system stubs using the AjiL generator which is currently under development. The editor is build using Eclipse Sirius. The source code including the generator can be found on GitHub.
